apple.description: An apple that has a worm in it...eww
apple.eat: You take a bite of the apple, you feel the rotting pieces of fruit slide down your throat. You feel a bit sick.
apple.examine: Upon closer examination, the apple is rotting. This is disgusting, I suggest you don't eat it.
apple.name: apple

dagger.examine: This dagger needs to be sharpened.
dagger.name: dagger

pen.description: A pen sit quietly on a table.
pen.examine: Seems like a regular pen, it is running out of ink
pen.name: pen

usedText.cell: You pull out your pen to write in your diary.

uniform.description: A spare uniform lies haphazardly on the ceramic floor.
uniform.examine: Seems like the standard guard uniforms given out by the foundation.
uniform.name: uniform

wearText.office: You put on the uniform. You look just like any other guard.

wires.examine: It's two metal wires, maybe useful in the future
wires.name: wires

usedText.cell: You use the wires to pick the lock. Congrats! You're now free to go outside your cell. Take a look outside.
